environment.label: Environment
environment.comment: In test mode your payments will not be sent to the bank.

rank.label: Rank number
rank.comment: Rank number provided by Paybox (last 2 digits).

hmackey.label: HMAC
hmackey.comment: Secrete HMAC key to create using the Paybox interface.

password.label: Paybox Back Office password
password.comment: Back Office password provided by Paybox.

customer_info.label: Show payment information to customers
customer_info.comment: Paybox module can show payment information to customer. You can disable this feature here.

cctypes.label: Card type
cctypes.comment: If you disable E-Carte Bleu, contact the Paybox support

tds_info.label: Make sure that the contract signed with your bank allows 3-D Secure before proceeding with setup.

tds_active.label: Enable 3-D Secure
tds_active.comment:
Warning: your bank may enforce 3-D Secure.
Make sure your setup is coherent with your bank, Paybox and Magento module.

pbxep_threetime.label: Pay by Card in N Times

info.label: Check your Paybox contract before enabling this option.

cctypes.label: Card type
cctypes.comment: If you disable E-Carte Bleu, contact the Paybox support

nbdays.label: NbDays
nbdays.comment: Enter a number for days, or 'x month, 'x week'.

tds_info.label: Make sure that the contract signed with your bank allows 3-D Secure before proceeding with setup.

tds_active.label: Enable 3-D Secure
tds_active.comment:
Warning: your bank may enforce 3-D Secure.
Make sure your setup is coherent with your bank, Paybox and Magento module.

pbxep_threetimeprivate.label: Pay by Private Card in N Times

nbdays.label: NbDays
nbdays.comment: Enter a number for days, or 'x month, 'x week'.

pbxep_prepaid.label: Pay by Saving or Prepaid Ticket

pbxep_financial.label: Pay by Card and Means of Financing
